name: Quake
desc: A minor tremor, testing the footing of all involved.
effect:: Choose a Boulder within Range 3. Draw a Line 6 from that Boulder, making an attack with the below chart against all targets in the area. Move the Boulder to the end of this Line after attacking.
boost:: 1 Momentum. Turn this Technique's area into Rough Terrain.

name: Cave
desc: A powerful technique that creates a cave below the ground, then collapses the ground downwards, sending enemies into a painful fall.
effect:: Select a Blast 2 area within range and make it Rough Terrain. At the Resolution Phase, resolve the below attack in the same area.
